QuestData.Title: De-Constructed
QuestData.Description: Saurok consistently test our borders, and our constructs usually fend them off. Some constructs, however, have been defeated and dragged back to Ihgaluk Crag.$b$bI want those constructs back. No slithering lizard will steal Silver Covenant property under my watch.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the four stolen Silver Covenant Constructs.
